summary: More than 5 years of experience in web programming and front-end development
More than 1 years of experience in development using Java
Have experience to develop front-end and back-end sides of application, so understand how both sides communicates with each other
Able to effectively solve the tasks in time, quickly learn new technologies, is able to quickly navigate and adapt in big projects

projects.name: Customer Success Platform - Thomson Reuters
description: The Customer Experience Platform is a react-based single page application with a Redux store that provides customers with a My Account experience.
In the platform, customers can view and pay their bills, manage users, submit and check on support tickets, and more.
responsibilities: Preparation codebase for a following rework

projects.name: CloudCall Unified Communications for CRM
description: CloudCall is the voice and communication system for sales and recruitment teams. It has strong, lasting relationships with leading CRM systems and business software providers to offer complete unified communications technology.

The plugin allows recruiters and salespeople without leaving their CRM or ATS fly through tasks with click-to-call, capture data with integrated notes and automatic call recording, view relevant caller notes and details through inbound caller notifications, and so on.
responsibilities: Implementing new features for crm plugin
Preparation codebase for a following rework

projects.name: Capital.com
description: Web-platform and hybrid mobile app for cfd trading.
CFD trading enables you to speculate on the rising or falling prices of fast-moving global financial markets.
responsibilities: Implementing new features for web-platform / mobile app

projects.name: Currency.com
description: Web-platform and hybrid mobile app for crypto trading.

Crypto trading works on tokenized security exchange platform, which make possible cryptocurrency investment by enabling anyone to trade financial markets without putting their crypto holdings under price pressure or moving to fiat.
responsibilities: Implementing new features for web-platform / mobile app

projects.name: Private airline-company application
projects.description: Web/mobile application for private airline-company, which manages booking flights for customers, booking maintenance for company and admin panel for managing price-rules.
responsibilities: Implementing features across entire the app
Updating the models of data and mapping which helps to transfer data between different modules of the app

projects.name: Internet provider task-management application
projects.description: Web/mobile app that manages with a lifecycle of tickets for technicians. Tickets have different statuses and can be observed by user and technicians.
responsibilities: Developing separate ReactJS component for reusing them across all the app
Updating the models of data and mapping which help to transfer data between different modules of the application

projects.name: Connected Car App
projects.description: Hybrid mobile app that helps a user to get some statistics about his car’s state, works with notifications, remote control, navigation.
responsibilities: Creating app screens for every particular feature, which included developing a structure of the application, developing basic react components for reuse, applying existed design to application

projects.name: Dynamics 365 CRM
projects.description: Huge ERP/CRM customer relationship management system focuses mainly on Sales, Marketing, and Service (help desk) sectors. The main goal is to provide highly configurable system to manage business processes and workflows inside companies.
responsibilities: Transfer features from Script# to Typescript

projects.name: Global Healthcare Exchange
description: Web-platform that allows suppliers, providers and GPO collaborate and trade.
It empowering healthcare organizations to maximize industry savings using cloud-based supply chain technology exchange platform, solutions, analytics and services.
responsibilities: Web-components: isolated parts of the app giving access to one aspect
Developing of separate app pages with its own logic
HTML markups for numerous parts of the app
